qcType, fieldName1, fieldName2, fieldName3, fieldName4, fieldName5, fieldName6, fieldName7, fieldName8, fieldName9, fieldName10, fieldName11, fieldName12, fieldName13, fieldName14, fieldName15, fieldName16, fieldName17, fieldName18, fieldName19, fieldName20, fieldName21, fieldName22, fieldName23, fieldName24, fieldName25, fieldName26, fieldName27, fieldName28, fieldName29, fieldName30, addPerson, addTime, delFlag ) VALUES (
#{qcType}, #{fieldName1}, #{fieldName2}, #{fieldName3}, #{fieldName4}, #{fieldName5}, #{fieldName6}, #{fieldName7}, #{fieldName8}, #{fieldName9}, #{fieldName10}, #{fieldName11}, #{fieldName12}, #{fieldName13}, #{fieldName14}, #{fieldName15}, #{fieldName16}, #{fieldName17}, #{fieldName18}, #{fieldName19}, #{fieldName20}, #{fieldName21}, #{fieldName22}, #{fieldName23}, #{fieldName24}, #{fieldName25}, #{fieldName26}, #{fieldName27}, #{fieldName28}, #{fieldName29}, #{fieldName30}, #{addPerson}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , 0 )
